data.sentence: The word وَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: he gave ear or listened to it, being pleased, grant leave, to allow, permit/ordered, be informed, advised, notification/announcement/proclamation, ear, appetite/longing/yearning.
data.sentence: The word يُؤْذَنُ comes from the root ا ذ ن and is associated with the meanings: he gave ear or listened to it, being pleased, grant leave, to allow, permit/ordered, be informed, advised, notification/announcement/proclamation, ear, appetite/longing/yearning.

data.meanings: to beg pardon, to excuse, to free anyone from guilt or blame, excuse/plea, those who put forth excuses, apologists.
data.sentence: The word فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ comes from the root ع ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: to beg pardon, to excuse, to free anyone from guilt or blame, excuse/plea, those who put forth excuses, apologists.
